mapper.sql: select bind_host_id from audit_user_info_bind_hosts where user_info_id = #{userId}
mapper.select:
SELECT b.id as id, c.host_name as host_name, c.ip_address as ip_address, c.idc_id as idc_id, c.`port` as port, c.enabled as enabled, d.username as username, d.auth_type as auth_type, e.name as idc FROM audit_user_info_bind_hosts as a JOIN audit_bindhost AS b ON a.bind_host_id = b.id JOIN audit_host AS c on b.host_id = c.id JOIN audit_hostuser AS d on b.host_user_id = d.id join audit_idc as e on e.id = c.idc_id
AND a.user_info_id = #{userId}
AND c.host_name like concat('%', #{hostName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND e.name like concat('%', #{idc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

SELECT b.host_name, b.ip_address, b.`port`, c.auth_type, c.username, c.`password` FROM audit_bindhost AS a JOIN audit_host as b ON a.host_id = b.id JOIN audit_hostuser AS c ON a.host_user_id = c.id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id as id, CONCAT('[', b.host_name,']',b.ip_address, ':', b.`port`) as hostInfo, d.`name` as idc, c.username as userName FROM audit_bindhost AS a JOIN audit_host as b ON a.host_id = b.id JOIN audit_hostuser AS c on a.host_user_id = c.id JOIN audit_idc AS d on b.idc_id = d.id

select a.id as id, b.id as hostId, c.id as hostUserId, concat(b.host_name, '[', b.ip_address, ']') as hostInfo, c.username as userInfo from audit_bindhost as a join audit_host as b on a.host_id = b.id join audit_hostuser as c on a.host_user_id = c.id
and b.host_name like concat('%', #{hostName}, '%')
and c.username like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
